net.canarymod.api

Interface PlayerReference

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    OfflinePlayer, Player

    public interface PlayerReference
    The reference that brings OfflinePlayer and Player together
    Author:
    Jason (darkdiplomat)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getEnderChestInventory

        Inventory getEnderChestInventory()
        Get player enderchest inventory. NOTE: An offline player will throw an exception with EnderChestInventory.getInventoryOwner() due to null reference.
        Returns:
        enderchest inventory
